universal_activityData_activityAnalysisR: All of the group's activity types are listed out according to active rate and time. The trainer can observe every single activity report and analyze based on time and heart rate zone trend.
universal_activityData_bodyDistributionR: Through the fat burn rate and body fat rate quadrant, trainers can collect the data on the average physique of the class members. This data comes in handy when observing whether the group has improved and set up goals from there.
universal_activityData_congratulationsFo: Congratulations! You have completed the test, your FTP is {{number}}.
universal_activityData_congratulationsOn: Congratulations! You have completed the goal {{number] {{unit}} for {{dataName}}.
universal_activityData_defineTheTraining: The FTP not only indicates the cyclist's performance, most importantly, it also defines the intensity zones for training.
universal_activityData_eventFileInformat: The Activity Data might include your workout data, heart rate, speed, location, altitude, activity type, course, device information, etc.
universal_activityData_fileNameToLong: The name must be {{number}}-{{number}} characters long
universal_activityData_findBodyFatMeter: Looking for device, please measure later.
universal_activityData_ftpDetectionInstr: Gradually adding cadence and resistance level until your heart rate intensity is in between zone 4 and zone 5; keep up for 20 minutes.
universal_activityData_ftpIsAboutToStart: FTP TEST is about to start
universal_activityData_ftpToDetectHeartR: You will need a heart rate sensor for the FTP test. Once you put it on, keep it as close to the spin bike as possible, the sensor and the bike console will be automatically connected.
universal_activityData_ftpZ0Info: This is the right zone to reduce the accumulated lactic acid. When the oxygen metabolizability rate is higher than consumption rate, there are enough oxygen in the muscle to burn the lactic acids.
universal_activityData_ftpZ1Info: You can sustain longer in this zone and improve your aerobic endurance in fixed speed through enhancing the lactate threshold and increasing glycogen storage in the muscles.
universal_activityData_ftpZ2Info: Most efficient zone, can last from 2 to 8 hours. The major zone for training and competition.
universal_activityData_ftpZ3Info: The upper limit of lactate threshold of the human body. If the accumulation of lactate has exceeded the depletion, it is going to impact your speed and physical performance.
universal_activityData_ftpZ4Info: You have exceeded the limit of the amount of oxygen the red blood cell could carry. Your muscles are short of oxgygen becasue muscles' oxygen consumption rate has exceeded the oxygen intake.
universal_activityData_ftpZ5Info: Starting from here, you energy system is mainly anaerobic based, which lactic acid is accumulating. If you have accumulated too much lactic acid in your body, you cannot perform high intensity workout, and should return to the aerobic zone.
universal_activityData_ftpZ6Info: Your current energy system is ATP-PC system, which you might be able to sustain for 5 to 15 seconds. The ability of doing so comes from the storage of creatine phosphate and glucose in the muscles. Your muscle mass is a decisive factor for your performance in this zone.
universal_activityData_highEnoughToUseMe: Exceeding Normal Range: may involve drug use.
universal_activityData_hrReportDescripti: A person's maximum heart rate is determined by one's hereditary factors and age. Resting heart rate reflects one's recover level or physique. Both data are crucial components in finding the right workout intensity.
universal_activityData_hrStatisticsDurin: You can make adjustment on training intensity and goals by reading the total ratio of each heart rate zone during activities. This data is based on  {{number}} activities.
universal_activityData_hrZoneTrendReport: See your time spent on each heart rate zone to measure your heart rate efficiency. You can view this trend chart to see if you have achieved the ideal intensity level and fulfill your goals.
universal_activityData_muscleColorIllust: The color scale is based on your one-repetition maximum (1RM)/ Body Weight ratio. This shows the 1RM of each muscle.
universal_activityData_noData: You have not created any activity or life tracking file.
universal_activityData_OenRmBodyWeightRa: Strength Training Zone: 1RM (one-repetition Maximum) will be calculated in percentage of your body weight for each individual zone. The color red indicates the weight you are carrying is close to a high percentage of your own body weight, or of higher level; on the other hand, the color blue indicates the opposite.
universal_activityData_overCumulative: Maintain {{dataName}} above {{number}} {{unit}}, you have currently reached {{number}} {{unit}}.
universal_activityData_personalInformati: The system will provide analysis based on different age, gender, physical data…etc. If you have question regarding to the system's report and analysis, please consult your fitness coach or your physician for professional guideline and suggestions regarding your health.
universal_activityData_pleaseLower: Heart rate intensity is too high, please reduce resistance and cadence.
universal_activityData_pleasePromote: Heart rate intensity is too low, please increase resistance and cadence.
universal_activityData_pleaseSetTheHeart: Please set up your heart rate zones. If you are unsure how to proceed, please select Maximum heart rate and key in your age.
universal_activityData_restNote: Pedal with ease to lower your heart rate back to zone 1 and zone 2. Take a 5-minute break to prepare for your test.
universal_activityData_sensorStopsToRest: When there is no actions on the weight training sensor, it will automatically enter the resting segment.
universal_activityData_sharedLifeMeta: {{nickName}} has shared life tracking record from | {{YYYY-MM-DD}}~{{YYYY-MM-DD}} | 。
universal_activityData_sleepReportInstru: You can analyze your sleeping quality by reading the report on each of your sleeping stages and turn over times.
universal_activityData_sportsStatisticsI: Your Exercise Report collects your activity and heart rate data from a certain time frame, this report does not include location information.
universal_activityData_standOnBodyFatMet: Please step on the Body Fat Monitor
universal_activityData_stepReportDescrip: The actual step counts are divided by whether your goals have been accomplished. You can evaluate your performance by the color division.
universal_activityData_trainingTrendDesc: From the bars below you can see the ratio of your 1RM (top of the bar) and average weight (bottom of the chart). You can determine your training intensity base on the correlation between the two. The total number in sets will determine the length between the top and the bottom. The longer the bar is, indicating that you've more counts in each sets, and vice versa.
universal_activityData_valuesOnlyPossibl: Way Exceeding Normal: only possible through drug use.
universal_activityData_warmUpInstruction: Warm up for 10 minutes. Exercise in between Heart Rate Intensity Zone 2 and Zone 3.
universal_activityData_welcomeUseSelectL: Thank you for choosing {{modelName}} {{deviceType}} , Please select language.
universal_activityData_welcomeUseText: No matter if you need to collect data from outdoor activities, indoor fitness, group sports, or daily health tracking, Alatech devices are your best solution on recording, cloud storage, and getting feedbacks.
universal_android_installationPermission:
For Android8.0 or later,
please enable installation permission.
universal_android_locationPermission: Allow CloudRun to access this device's location
universal_android_scanConsent: For AndroidM(6.0) or later, enable access location to scan Bluetooth devices. Your location will be used for scanning purpose only.
universal_app_alaconnectInfo: View your workout data on your phone, with compatible devices, you can set up Step Goals, Heart Rate Monitor, Sleep Goals, and more! It will record these all for you while exercising!
universal_app_appInfo1: The application is for personal use with wearable devices and/or in gym. You can record and upload different types of workout activities including indoor and outdoor running, cycling, weight training, treadmill training, rower routine, aerobic activities, and more.
universal_app_appInfo2: You can view all the relevant data such as coordinate and route, distance, time, cadence, watt, weight training sets, weight training parts, altitude, and calorie burn rate. The application provides more than 40 weight training programs and is compatible with many Bluetooth equipment and sensors.
universal_app_cloudRunInfo: Cloud run will simulate the elevation of existing routes on yours and your friends Alatech treadmill. Real-time virtual competition anytime, at your house.
universal_app_cloudRunSlogan: Make Running Exciting, Achieving, and Competitive Through Interactive Races.
universal_app_connectSlogan: Workout any time, sync anywhere. Get your workout and life tracking analysis.
universal_app_fitnessInfo: No matter if you are an avid indoor fitness guru or an outdoor activist, AlaFitness is your lifelong training recorder!
universal_app_fitnessSlogan:
Full-function activity tracker
Your best workout companion
universal_app_gptInfo2: GPT Fit offers an environment for numerous sports options and daily life recording. Whether it is for personal use or for your gym, through compatible wearable device, mobile apps, and IoT fitness equipment, you can easily collect data for different activities.
universal_app_gptInfo3: GPT Fit will provide the record and analysis no matter if you are doing outdoor running, aerobic activities, swimming, weight training, group training, gym workout, or even advocating fitness in your business.
universal_app_gptSlogan:
Get your physical analysis
Life Tracking, Real Time Sharing and Fun Competitions; All on GPTfit!
universal_app_groupInfo1: Through GPT Fit group training system, you can analyze the data of your members(1). A better understanding on their performance will help you to observe their needs better, such as their preferred speed, goals, best cadence, etc.
universal_app_groupInfo2: Through collecting data on physique, such as weight, fat rate, muscle rate, etc., you can train your team, manage your gym, or promote fitness in your enterprise more efficiently and encourage one another for improvement.
universal_app_groupInfoComment1: 1. Members need to join the group and agree to the privacy policy to enable their data to go public.
universal_app_hrInfo1: Heart rate is the best indicator for your physical condition. Since heart rate and the VO2Max are in direct relation with each other, it is practical to monitor your workout intensity based on your heart rate. Use heart rate zone to indicate activity intensity is one of the simplest and common method.
universal_app_hrInfo2: Through observing changes within your heart rate zones, you can identify if you are under or over training. You can also quickly assess your endurance and recovery level.
universal_app_iotInfo1: Designed for gym and group trainers, in sets with sensors, ATTACUS wearable devices and equipment. Trainers can now view their students' data on the TrainLIVE app own by either the gym or the trainer.
universal_app_iotInfo2: Group workout data is recorded live through TrainLive and send to trainee's cloud simultaneously with analysis reports.
universal_app_lifeInfo1: A healthy lifestyle is formed by daily progress. Even small improvement on step counts, heart rate performance, and sleep quality is meaningful. Putting on a wearable device can help you measure your health data 24/7. You can also have better mastery over your physique through recording accurate data, such as body fat, muscle ratio, body water percentage, and more.
universal_app_lifeInfo2: View your daily progress at a glance. Recording from the smallest change in your life to all the information you need, this system will motivate you to lead an active and healthy lifestyle.
universal_app_sportsScienceInfo1: We have categorized collected data based on different sport types, such as coordinate, speed, altitude for running; watt, cadence for cycling. You can find your organized data on GPTfit in comprehensive and colorful visuals.
universal_app_sportsScienceInfo2: Different data groups are put into zones and represented by colors. Through compare and contrast past records and analysis, you can observe your progress at a glance.
universal_app_trainLiveInfo: Provide trainers with student members’ real-time workout data and synchronized workout intensity for more efficient training! Activity records are also available to students!
universal_app_trainLiveSlogan:
Build Real-Time Workout Data
Make Your Group Training More Efficient and Effective
universal_app_wearableInfo1: Our wearable devices are designed for the needs of athletes. Various activity has different data in display, such as pace, power, muscle strength, swimming posture, calorie burn, etc., as well as daily activity tracking on steps, heart rate, sleep quality, etc.
universal_app_wearableInfo2: We strive to provide users a scientific and efficient workout experience for a healthy lifestyle. Through AlaConnect™ app, you can sync data from your devices with the cloud database, which allows long-term tracking and analysis. You can then view your workout and daily life tracking analysis on GPTfit to observe your progress!

universal_group_createClassStatement: GPTfit will provide sport and workout reports, Life Tracking data, or other long term recording and analysis. The purpose of which allows coaches to provide professional guidance and analysis for student members’ fitness performance. This platform DOES NOT intend to provide any medical advice or diagnostics.
universal_group_createFitnessGroupPrivac: Once your student members have agree with the Terms, their privacy setting for “future workout” or workout report will changed automatically and privacy status will be titled “My Gym.” The student members can still edit their privacy settings or withdraw from the course and end the trainer-trainee relationship.
universal_group_doYouWantToEnd: Do you want to end the class?
universal_group_enterGroupIdName: Look-up by group ID or name.
universal_group_exerciseEffectiveness: You can evaluate your workout efficiency according to the average heart rate zones and new fat-burn in body fat percentage.
universal_group_fitnessGroupDisclaimer: Alatech holds no responsibility to any injuries or harms occur in class or while using Alatech products. Students members/or trainees are responsible to consult their coaches and/or the fitness institution where their classes are held regarding their own limitation and class intensity.
universal_group_followExerciseTypeCreate: Create your report according to your workout types and class time
universal_group_groupOperationExpired: Group operation plan expired at [YYYY]-[MM]-[DD]. Please contact the administrator.
universal_group_insufficientAuthority: You are not permitted to access data for {{number}}  person(s).
universal_group_joinClassStatement: GPTfit will provide sport and workout reports, Life Tracking data, or other long term recording and analysis. The purpose of which allows coaches to provide professional guidance and analysis for student members’ fitness performance. This platform DOES NOT intend to provide any medical advice or diagnostics. Fitness institutions and/or coaches are advised to survey and understand any possible health or medical condition of their students, both physically and mentally, which may restrict the student member’s capability or causing harm to themselves in class performance, prior to any course activity. When accepting to this terms thereof, all the student members will be suggested to edit their privacy settings for their workout reports, and change the privacy status into {{object}}. Student members may edit their privacy setting in their personal profile, or withdraw from the course and end the coach-student relationship. Alatech holds no responsibility to any injuries or harms in class. Students members are responsible to consult their coaches and/or the fitness institution where their classes are held regarding their own limitation and class intensity.
universal_group_joinFitnessGroupPrivacyS: Before attending any course activities, be sure to provide information regarding any existing injuries or restrictions, and/or abide by surveys that concerns about the aforementioned conditions from the coaches and the fitness institutions responsible.
universal_group_joinStatementP1: GPTfit only provides analysis based on activity records, daily life tracking, or any long-term data collection. This supports {{partyB}} to maintain physical wellness and arrange suitable training routine. However, the purpose of this platform does not include providing medical guidance or diagnosis. When {{partyB}} first started an activity, the responsible event supervisor must make sure if {{partyB}} has any physical or mental condition that may restrict {{partyB}} to certain activity or propose danger to {{partyB}}.
universal_group_joinStatementP2: Alatech is not responsible for those who fail to provide, or intentionally conceal, truthful information regarding to physical conditions, need medical attention or treatment. When you have agree with the acknowledgement, you will be advised to edit the Privacy Settings and enable your information to {{partyB}} relationship.
universal_group_marketingPermissionDescr: System Marketing and Planning Service Setting, this will support registrants on appointing related personnels.
universal_group_masterStateOfMindStateme: For coaches, please be sure to understand each student member’ health condition or do they have any existing injuries or restrictions, and/or survey the students if they have any health restrictions.

The purpose of which allows coaches to provide professional guidance and analysis for student members’ fitness performance. This platform DOES NOT intend to provide any medical advice or diagnostics.

You can change these features on your personal profile or withdraw from the course and end the trainer-trainee relationship.

universal_privacy_yourAdministrator: Your group administrator, such as fitness coach or manager from your enterprise.
universal_race_leaderboardRefresh: The ranking is refreshed every day at 6:00. The finalized ranking will be released at 23:59 on the last day of the month.

universal_race_theFinalRankingIsBasedOnT: Final ranking is dependent on the data collected by the server.
universal_race_timelineIncorrect: Starting time is greater than finishing time.
universal_sportsTerm_bodyWeight:
BW Stands for Body-Weight, this calculation is based on one’s own body weight. For instance, it should be within a normal range when a 90kg person is capable of lifting 90kg of weight in bench press, whereas it would be of professional level for a 60kg person lifting up 90kg of weight.
Therefore, you should set your goals based on your own body weight. For example, you can set goals of lifting up 75% of your weight in 1 month, achieving 100%BW in 3 months, and reaching 150%BW, or professional level, in 1 year. With clear goals like this can motivate you to continue on.
universal_sportsTerm_oneRepMax: 1RM, is short for One-Repetition Maximum, or One Rep Max. It represents the maximum strength the muscle could bear in each contraction. For instance, if a person could perform Bench Press 8 times per session with 50 kg of weight but only once for 62 kg, then 62kg is his/her 1RM for Bench Press. Each posture requires movements from different muscle groups therefore the 1RM rate for each muscle group will differ.
universal_sportsTerm_viceMuscle: The white areas indicates the supporting muscle groups and are solely for labeling and reference.
universal_sportsTerm_weightTrainingEffec: Strength Training Outcome: This chart uses the percentage of 1RM and BW as quantitative basis. The higher percentile represents relatively greater strength, and is indicated by changing from blue to red.
universal_sportsTerm_zone1: Indicates warm-up and/or recovery heart rate between workout.
universal_sportsTerm_zone2: Shows that you are staying right beneath, almost reaching, the aerobic threshold; this is an ideal zone for fat burning.
universal_sportsTerm_zone3: Training in this zone helps you improve basic fitness level and muscle strength; it represents intermediate level of endurance and training.
universal_sportsTerm_zone4: Training in this zone is mainly for endurance running; staying within your lactate threshold can improve your strength and speed.
universal_sportsTerm_zone5: Lactate Steady State, MLSS - you can train for lactic acid resistance and oxygen uptake in short segments but not for a long period.

universal_uiFitpair_enabledFitPair: Do you want to enable  fitpair  on this device?
universal_uiFitpair_fitpairDescription:
When using the heart rate broadcasting in the Train Live gym, your activity exercise file will be recorded, shared, and competed with others in the gym.
※Both the device settings and personal privacy settings can be modified in the future
universal_uiFitpair_fitpairDetailDescrip:
fitpair is a IoT fitness integration system developed by Alatech Inc. If you have a compatible Alatech device, you can use Ant+ or Bluetooth signal to send to Train Live™ (1), which will record your exercise process and instantly broadcast online.
The live broadcast allows the gym coach or instructor to better understand your physical condition, so that they can help you making adjustment or improvement, the interaction between members will be enhanced. After finishing the activity or course, all of your exercise history records will be transferred to your activity record for creating a trend report.
When live broadcasting and recording the exercise data, the privacy information can be decided and set by the user.

(1)Train Live™ is an application executed by the gym, and with the application of Wasp, the coach can live broadcast and record exercise history data.

universal_userAccount_accountDeletionIns: The account cannot be restored after the deletion process: your account and data will be permanently deleted, and we will remove you from all associations, including devices, communities... etc.

Once you have requested to delete your account, a message will be sent to either your email or mobile phone. There will be a 7-day period to reconsider if you really want to delete your account. After 7 days, the account cannot be restored.

universal_waspSetUp_waspApMode: Turn on the WASP by holding the power button for three seconds. Press the power button to put the WASP in AP mode when red light is flashing rapidly. In AP mode, the green light should be flashing once per second.

universal_vocabulary_trainingProgramShar: Shared a training program with you
universal_vocabulary_cloudrunIntroBestTr: The best instructor for road running training

Cloud running is a road running simulation training sports APP, is any runner has used will fall in love with the training mode, while multiple people connected to compete for the best results, there are also sports report analysis at any time to help you adjust the best state, simulating the world-renowned running point road conditions can be directly applied to the training experience on the treadmill directly applied to the real road running sense, easy GET ideal results.
universal_vocabulary_cloudrunIntroBeginC: Cloud Run actually comes from a thoughtful idea!! Running training, especially marathon training, in Taiwan's geographical and climatic conditions, it is not easy to get complete and long-term regular training, and now with air pollution as the highest harm, the emergence of cloud running not only solves the geographical and climatic restrictions, but also can run through the world's popular running points through the cloud running map.
universal_vocabulary_cloudrunIntroHowRea: How cloud run creates a real sense of running

Paired with the ATTACUS Smart Treadmill, a connection can be established to simulate the actual road conditions through the treadmill to change the height of the route. With a treadmill that can be automatically lifted and lowered, the simulation of the field slope change training, to achieve the purpose of long-term regular training.
universal_vocabulary_cloudrunIntroSocial: Cloud Run is a runner's social hub

Cloud running is also a kind of cloud community center, not only users can train road running through the map, but also open the competition mode and other runners to train and compete together, can participate in many people at the same time, through the cloud running APP to promote runners from all over the world to compete and train together, in addition, we can also watch the competition in time through the viewing mode, so that you can also have a sense of presence in the current situation of the competition.
universal_vocabulary_cloudrunIntroEarn: What can you get by using CloudRun
universal_vocabulary_cloudrunIntroEarnCo: Instant motion data is transmitted via Bluetooth to ALA CloudRun records and timely to the game for racing or simulated road running practice with other runners. Important statistics such as distance, pace, speed, speed, and calories burned are available during and after the event. All exercise data analysis, statistics... etc., can be seen on the GPTfit.
universal_vocabulary_cloudrunIntroGetCon: is a treadmill real route connection competition and social interaction application, paired with a compatible Alatech treadmill, can establish a cloud road run, The change in route height is simulated by a treadmill to simulate actual road conditions.
